mapper.insert: insert into student(sno, mno, sname, ssex, enrollmentyear) VALUES (#{SNO},#{MNO},#{SNAME},#{SSEX},#{ENROLLMENTYEAR});
mapper.update: update student set mno = #{mno}, sname = #{sname}, ssex = #{ssex}, enrollmentyear = #{enrollmentyear} where sno=#{sno}
mapper.select: select * from stuinfo where sno like #{sno};
